text.en: Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower "Archfiend" monster from your hand or Deck, or if you have a face-up "Archfiend" Ritual Monster in your Extra Deck, you can Special Summon 1 "Royal Archfiend", 1 "Duke Archfiend", and/or 1 "Highness Archfiend" from your hand and/or Deck instead. You can only activate 1 "Archfiend's Jest" per turn.
